data.text: @nufcnuttas @ARKWalton @Trustme2222 @NHSuk My uncle was high risk, he caught it and it almost killed him. He used to run marathons and now he can't get up the stairs without wheezing.
@nufcnuttas @_LavenderLemon @Trustme2222 @NHSuk Just because it’s ‘just cold symptoms or asymptomatic’ for you doesn’t mean you can’t pass it on to someone it might kill.
@NHSuk I blcked you already for misinformation? https://t.co/uWcH7tOPjt

@_LavenderLemon @ARKWalton @Trustme2222 @NHSuk Good! Stops all the isolation lovers getting paid to sit at home. If you’re feeling ill have a couple of days off,if you’re asymptomatic or cold symptoms just carry on and suck it up . 👍🏻
@Trustme2222 @NHSuk No one has to do what Johnson says!
@NHSuk Don't do what Johnson says ever!
@NHSuk Nope! Not law anymore so I carry on as usual thanks 👍🏻
@NHSuk End the testing now and give up NHS and stop it now and we don't need it anymore
